Frequently Asked Questions

How do I create a job posting?

▼
Navigate to Jobs > Create Job, fill in the required details, and click Save. You can also use AI generation for faster creation.

How do I use AI-powered career tools?

▼
Sign in to your account, go to Career Tools section, and select the tool you need (Resume Review, Cover Letter Generator, etc.). You must be authenticated to use these features.

Can I import jobs in bulk?

▼
Yes! Go to Bulk Operations > Import Jobs, and upload your CSV file with job data. Download our template for the correct format.

How do I manage user permissions?

▼
As an admin, navigate to Settings > User Management to add sub-admins, assign roles, and manage permissions.

How can I view analytics?

▼
Access the Analytics Dashboard from the main menu to view user engagement, job statistics, and API usage metrics.
